name: Note
short_description: Displays custom text or headings in forms.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (mandatory or optional if using description) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the note

properties3.name: description
properties3.description: (optional if using label)(translatable) the description/text of the note

properties4.name: heading
properties4.description: (optional) the type of heading element to use for the label (default: h4)

properties5.name: class
properties5.description: (optional) a class name (or class names), like these examples ( alert, alert alert-info, alert alert-success, alert alert-error )

properties6.name: close
properties6.description: (optional) a value of 'true' (for alerts) or the value for the data-dismiss of the bootstrap close icon

properties7.name: showon
properties7.description: (optional) Allows you to hide the field based on the value(s) of another field; for Joomla 3.2.4+ https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: This form field makes it possible to create titles, texts, descriptions and even alert boxes. It also allows you to bring order in the settings for extensions, by separating them with useful titles. Or adding descriptions for certain settings (without having to rely on the tooltips). Or adding any other text you want.
